com.actionsoft.sdk.local.api.cc

接口 MongoDBAPI

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable

    public interface MongoDBAPI
extends java.io.Closeable
    https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/connection-string/#connections-standard-connection-string-format mongo api提供了一些工具方法，通过静态引用可简化编程，例如： import static com.mongodb.client.model.Filters; import static com.mongodb.client.model.Updates; import static com.mongodb.client.model.Sorts; import static com.mongodb.client.model.Indexes;

      • createCollection

      • createCollection

        void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                      CreateCollectionOptions createCollectionOptions)
        Create a collection with the provided name and options.
        参数:
        collectionName - name of the collection
        collectionOptions - options to use when creating the collection.

      • getCollectionNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getCollectionNames()
        A set of collection names.
        返回:
        list of collection names

      • getCollection

        <any> getCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Get a collection by name, creating it if it doesn't exist.

        Translate any exceptions as necessary.

        参数:
        collectionName - name of the collection
        返回:
        an existing collection or a newly created one.

      • collectionExists

        boolean collectionExists(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Check to see if a collection with a given name exists.

        Translate any exceptions as necessary.

        参数:
        collectionName - name of the collection
        返回:
        true if a collection with the given name is found, false otherwise.

      • dropCollection

        void dropCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Drop the collection with the given name.

        Translate any exceptions as necessary.

        参数:
        collectionName - name of the collection to drop/delete.

                   java.lang.Class<T> resultClass)

        类型参数:

        参数:
        fieldName - the field name
        resultClass - the class to cast any distinct items into.
        返回:
        an iterable of distinct values

      • aggregate

        <any> aggregate(java.lang.String collection,
                java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline)
        Aggregates documents according to the specified aggregation pipeline.
        参数:
        pipeline - the aggregate pipeline
        返回:
        an iterable containing the result of the aggregation operation

      • aggregate

        <T> <any> aggregate(java.lang.String collection,
                    java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline,
                    java.lang.Class<T> resultClass)
        Aggregates documents according to the specified aggregation pipeline.
        类型参数:
        T - the target document type of the iterable.
        参数:
        pipeline - the aggregate pipeline
        resultClass - the class to decode each document into
        返回:
        an iterable containing the result of the aggregation operation

      • mapReduce

        <any> mapReduce(java.lang.String collection,
                java.lang.String mapFunction,
                java.lang.String reduceFunction)
        Aggregates documents according to the specified map-reduce function.
        参数:
        mapFunction - A JavaScript function that associates or "maps" a value with a key and emits the key and value pair.
        reduceFunction - A JavaScript function that "reduces" to a single object all the values associated with a particular key.
        返回:
        an iterable containing the result of the map-reduce operation

      • mapReduce

        <T> <any> mapReduce(java.lang.String collection,
                    java.lang.String mapFunction,
                    java.lang.String reduceFunction,
                    java.lang.Class<T> resultClass)
        Aggregates documents according to the specified map-reduce function.
        类型参数:
        T - the target document type of the iterable.
        参数:
        mapFunction - A JavaScript function that associates or "maps" a value with a key and emits the key and value pair.
        reduceFunction - A JavaScript function that "reduces" to a single object all the values associated with a particular key.
        resultClass - the class to decode each resulting document into.
        返回:
        an iterable containing the result of the map-reduce operation

      • bulkWrite

        BulkWriteResult bulkWrite(java.lang.String collection,
                          java.util.List<? extends <any>> requests)
        Executes a mix of inserts, updates, replaces, and deletes.
        参数:
        requests - the writes to execute
        返回:
        the result of the bulk write
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoBulkWriteException - if there's an exception in the bulk write operation
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if there's an exception running the operation

      • bulkWrite

        BulkWriteResult bulkWrite(java.lang.String collection,
                          java.util.List<? extends <any>> requests,
                          BulkWriteOptions options)
        Executes a mix of inserts, updates, replaces, and deletes.
        参数:
        requests - the writes to execute
        options - the options to apply to the bulk write operation
        返回:
        the result of the bulk write
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoBulkWriteException - if there's an exception in the bulk write operation
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if there's an exception running the operation

      • insertOne

        void insertOne(java.lang.String collection,
               Document document)
        Inserts the provided document. If the document is missing an identifier, the driver should generate one.
        参数:
        document - the document to insert
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the insert command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • insertOne

        void insertOne(java.lang.String collection,
               Document document,
               InsertOneOptions options)
        Inserts the provided document. If the document is missing an identifier, the driver should generate one.
        参数:
        document - the document to insert
        options - the options to apply to the operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the insert command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoCommandException - if the write failed due to document validation reasons
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure
        从以下版本开始:
        3.2

      • insertMany

        void insertMany(java.lang.String collection,
                java.util.List<? extends Document> documents)
        Inserts one or more documents. A call to this method is equivalent to a call to the bulkWrite method
        参数:
        documents - the documents to insert
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoBulkWriteException - if there's an exception in the bulk write operation
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure
        另请参阅:
        com.mongodb.client.MongoCollection#bulkWrite

      • insertMany

        void insertMany(java.lang.String collection,
                java.util.List<? extends Document> documents,
                InsertManyOptions options)
        Inserts one or more documents. A call to this method is equivalent to a call to the bulkWrite method
        参数:
        documents - the documents to insert
        options - the options to apply to the operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.DuplicateKeyException - if the write failed to a duplicate unique key
        com.mongodb.WriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • deleteOne

        DeleteResult deleteOne(java.lang.String collection,
                       Bson filter)
        Removes at most one document from the collection that matches the given filter. If no documents match, the collection is not modified.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the delete operation
        返回:
        the result of the remove one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the delete command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • deleteOne

        DeleteResult deleteOne(java.lang.String collection,
                       Bson filter,
                       DeleteOptions options)
        Removes at most one document from the collection that matches the given filter. If no documents match, the collection is not modified.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the delete operation
        options - the options to apply to the delete operation
        返回:
        the result of the remove one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the delete command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4

      • deleteMany

        DeleteResult deleteMany(java.lang.String collection,
                        Bson filter)
        Removes all documents from the collection that match the given query filter. If no documents match, the collection is not modified.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the delete operation
        返回:
        the result of the remove many operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the delete command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • deleteMany

        DeleteResult deleteMany(java.lang.String collection,
                        Bson filter,
                        DeleteOptions options)
        Removes all documents from the collection that match the given query filter. If no documents match, the collection is not modified.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the delete operation
        options - the options to apply to the delete operation
        返回:
        the result of the remove many operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the delete command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4

      • replaceOne

        UpdateResult replaceOne(java.lang.String collection,
                        Bson filter,
                        Document replacement)
        Replace a document in the collection according to the specified arguments.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the replace operation
        replacement - the replacement document
        返回:
        the result of the replace one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the replace command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • replaceOne

        UpdateResult replaceOne(java.lang.String collection,
                        Bson filter,
                        Document replacement,
                        UpdateOptions updateOptions)
        Replace a document in the collection according to the specified arguments.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the replace operation
        replacement - the replacement document
        updateOptions - the options to apply to the replace operation
        返回:
        the result of the replace one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the replace command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • updateOne

        UpdateResult updateOne(java.lang.String collection,
                       Bson filter,
                       Bson update)
        Update a single document in the collection according to the specified arguments.
        参数:
        filter - a document describing the query filter, which may not be null.
        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.
        返回:
        the result of the update one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the update command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • updateOne

        UpdateResult updateOne(java.lang.String collection,
                       Bson filter,
                       Bson update,
                       UpdateOptions updateOptions)
        Update a single document in the collection according to the specified arguments.
        参数:
        filter - a document describing the query filter, which may not be null.
        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.
        updateOptions - the options to apply to the update operation
        返回:
        the result of the update one operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the update command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the write failed due some other failure

      • updateMany

                        Bson filter,
                        Bson update)

        参数:

        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.
        返回:
        the result of the update many operation
        抛出:
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteException - if the write failed due some other failure specific to the update command
        com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException - if the write failed due being unable to fulfil the write concern

        参数:

        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.

      • findOneAndDelete

        Document findOneAndDelete(java.lang.String collection,
                          Bson filter)
        Atomically find a document and remove it.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to find the document with
        返回:
        the document that was removed. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned

      • findOneAndDelete

        Document findOneAndDelete(java.lang.String collection,
                          Bson filter,
                          FindOneAndDeleteOptions options)
        Atomically find a document and remove it.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to find the document with
        options - the options to apply to the operation
        返回:
        the document that was removed. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned

      • findOneAndReplace

        Document findOneAndReplace(java.lang.String collection,
                           Bson filter,
                           Document replacement)
        Atomically find a document and replace it.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the replace operation
        replacement - the replacement document
        返回:
        the document that was replaced. Depending on the value of the returnOriginal property, this will either be the document as it was before the update or as it is after the update. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned

      • findOneAndReplace

        Document findOneAndReplace(java.lang.String collection,
                           Bson filter,
                           Document replacement,
                           FindOneAndReplaceOptions options)
        Atomically find a document and replace it.
        参数:
        filter - the query filter to apply the the replace operation
        replacement - the replacement document
        options - the options to apply to the operation
        返回:
        the document that was replaced. Depending on the value of the returnOriginal property, this will either be the document as it was before the update or as it is after the update. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned

      • findOneAndUpdate

        Document findOneAndUpdate(java.lang.String collection,
                          Bson filter,
                          Bson update)
        Atomically find a document and update it.
        参数:
        filter - a document describing the query filter, which may not be null.
        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.
        返回:
        the document that was updated before the update was applied. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned

      • findOneAndUpdate

        Document findOneAndUpdate(java.lang.String collection,
                          Bson filter,
                          Bson update,
                          FindOneAndUpdateOptions options)
        Atomically find a document and update it.
        参数:
        filter - a document describing the query filter, which may not be null.
        update - a document describing the update, which may not be null. The update to apply must include only update operators.
        options - the options to apply to the operation
        返回:
        the document that was updated. Depending on the value of the returnOriginal property, this will either be the document as it was before the update or as it is after the update. If no documents matched the query filter, then null will be returned
